name: Twenty (ShinyTseul)
description:
This is a simple dice game I designed a few years ago. I haven't thought much of it since then, until the 20th Anniversary GameMaker Game Jam, which has the theme of "20." It was fate. So I turned my dice game into a video game. I hope you enjoy it!

Rules:

Take turns rolling two dice. Each die is scored separately:

1 - Gain 1 point

2 - Gain 2 points

3 - Choose an opponent to lose 1 point

4 - Lose 1 point

5 - Skip your next roll

6 - Extra roll

Doubles - Bonus + 2 points

The first player to get at least 20 points wins!

There are a few other rolls, but I didn't have time to put them in, because college and stuff.

If you have any questions or concerns, please email me at shinytseul@gmail.com and I will respond promptly.

Known deficiencies:

- Tiebreakers above 10 points weren't included in this release

- Selecting a player to lose a point is difficult when there are multiple in one space

- Didn't have time to animate the dice I drew, that'll have to be a future update

- There is no sound, resulting in a somewhat ominous silence

- Some messages seem to play multiple times. If I had more time, I could have smoothed it out a bit better.
